Stingtra: Are you sure he can in his condition?
  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: Talon Harvilicz 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, Jul=
y 28, 2000 4:29 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Wildfire: 




  Wildf=
ire looked back at KitKat and sat back. He listened to her with her mind, w=
atched as the pictures went by in her head. She let the other images pass b=
y until she saw the image of the little snake-bot in the main section where=
 KitKat said where the strange wolf-bot was. She did see it, and she also s=
aw Quickstrike. 

  She shook her head, breaking the link. It's not enough,=
 she said. She turned her head back to Quickstrike. He may have to tell me.=
 


  >From: logomorph@... 
  >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  >To:=

  > 
  >She looked at Quickstrike. =
she sighed and looked at Wildfire. 
  >"OK, I'll help. I'll show you what h=
appened from my point. But I'm 
  >only doing this for my friend. But remem=
ber, you harm him in anyway 
  >and your slag. Got! it!" 
  > 
  >She sat d=
own her haunches down, and sat upright in wolf mode. She 
  >went through h=
er mind from when she first went into the cave to the 
  >pond, to the tunn=
el, to finding Quickstrike, to seeing the strange 
  >wolf bot, to being ki=
cked across the cave, to escaping out of the 
  >cave.
